title: DVDFab 9.1.6.6-Final-PA-September 4, 2014.rar
description:
Changes in DVDFab 9.1.6.6 (September 04, 2014):


 New: Improved support for DVD copy protections.

 New: Improved support for IQS (Intel Quick Sync) GPU conversion.

 New: Added video adjust feature (Brightness, Contrast and Saturation)in Ripper and Video Converter.

 New: Added support to merge multiple video files in Video Converter.

 New: Added support to preserve file chapters in Video Converter.

 New: Added support to set Ã¢â‚¬Å“Scale MethodÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ at Common Settings -> Conversion -> Convert. (The option will be used when the output resolution is different from the source resolution.)

 New: Add support to set Ã¢â‚¬Å“Deinterlacing MethodÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ at Common Settings -> Conversion -> Convert.(The option will be used when converting interlaced source in Ripper and Video Converter.)

 Fix: A problem that the GUI character is messed up in certain cases. 
(NOTE: Please change the display method at Common Settings -> General -> Click Ã¢â‚¬Å“AÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ icon if you are experiencing some GUI character display problems.)

 Fix: An uncompressed problem when copying Blu-ray 3D fulldisc to BD25 with Ã¢â‚¬Å“Copy as 3DÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ option selected in certain cases.

 Fix: A failure problem when converting Blu-ray to mkv.h264.aac in certain cases.

 Fix: A problem that the converted mp4 (MPEG4) files are not playable in Windows Media Player.

 Fix: A failure problem when converting to profile Ã¢â‚¬Å“Xbox 360 (WMV)Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ in Ripper.

 Fix: A problem that the subtitle color of the output file is not correct in certain cases.

 Fix: Some minor changes and improvements.
